Html:
Hi
Am working a project to read from the .ini file. Some of the value is numeric which need numeric up down control which is missing from wpf. Do you have any idea?? Please

H

Hi H,

We don't currently have an official NumericUpDown control, but we'll actually be releasing one in a few months along with the Ribbon control (it will be called Spinner).  In the meantime, there are a bunch of samples available which you could use as a starting point.  The Bag-O-Tricks includes a NumericUpDown here: http://windowsclient.net/downloads/folders/controlgallery/entry2358.aspx, and MSDN has a sample here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms771595(VS.85).aspx.  There are also a bunch of third party implementations.

Thanks,
Samantha
